briefTitle: An Efficacy and Safety Study of Ivacaftor in Patients With Cystic Fibrosis and Two Splicing Mutations

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Subjects are \>18 years of age and able to provide informed consent.
* Subjects reside in the US and are willing to be treated with ivacaftor.
* Subjects have the splicing mutation of interest.
* Subjects are willing and able to perform requirements of the study.

Exclusion Criteria:

* There are no relevant exclusion criteria for this n-of-2 study.

outcomeMeasures.title: Forced Expiratory Volume
outcomeMeasures.description: Absolute change in percent predicted in 1 second FEV1 from baseline through week 24

outcomeMeasures.title: Sputum Results
outcomeMeasures.description: Achievement of mycobacterial culture conversion (negative culture)

outcomeMeasures.title: Sweat Chloride
outcomeMeasures.description: Testing efficacy through gathering absolute change in sweat chloride from baseline through week 24
